name: Civil penalties
text: §489D-28  Civil penalties.  The commissioner may assess a fine against a person who violates this chapter or a rule adopted or an order issued under this chapter in an amount not to exceed $1,000 per day for each day the violation is outstanding, plus the State's costs and expenses for the investigation and prosecution of the matter, including reasonable attorneys' fees. [L 2006, c 153, pt of §1; am L 2008, c 195, §14; am L 2013, c 167, §14]
